page.title: 02 CENTRES OF WORSHIP
page.content: LOCAL RELIGION CENTRES ON A NUMBER OF ANGLICAN PARISH CHURCHES WHICH SERVE SOCIAL AS WELL AS RELIGIOUS PURPOSES, AND CHURCHES OF OTHER DENOMINATIONS SERVING THE COMMUNITY OF STRATFORD ITSELF.THERE IS A CHRISTADELPHIAN HALL WHICH HAS A MODERN BUILDING AND A HIGHLY ACTIVE CONGREGATION,A UNITED REFORMED CHURCH AND THE CHRISTIAN SCIENCE READING ROOMS WHICH PROVIDE A QUIET ATMOSPHERE FOR THE MORE PENSIVE AMONG THE COMMUNITY.THERE ARE THREE ANGLICAN VILLAGE CHURCHES;ST.HELENS IN CLIFFORD CHAMBERS,LUDDINGTON CHURCH WHERE SHAKESPEARE IS THOUGHT TO HAVE BEEN MARRIED,AND ST.ANDREWÂ£S IN SHOTTERY,ALL OF WHICH ARE EXTREMELY ATTRACTIVE.ST.ANDREWÂ£S IS OF QUITE A HIGH CHURCH TRADITION AND THE MAIN SUNDAY SERVICE IS THE EUCHARIST WHERE CHRISTIANS COMMEMORATE THE LAST SUPPER OF JESUS.
